item.title: Chance, Luck and Destiny
item.description: About the Book Collection of original material, prose and verse, fact and fiction, on the themes of the title. Author Comment My UK editor, Joanna Goldsworthy, asked if I’d like to do a short non-fiction book about chance and luck. I’m very interested in the subject, but not enough of a coherent thinker to do a straight treatise. A sort of scrap-book was an obvious solution, and since I’m also hopeless at research it was much easier for me to use fiction and verse to illustrate some of the points.
